bullet: Capable of configuring and maintaining MongoDB databases for use with small to medium sized web-apps
Skilled at using remote databases in cloud (using Atlas/Compass), or local databases set up on Linux servers
Built many templates and personal projects using MongoDB along with JavaScript based clients
name: MongoDB
desc: MongoDB is a top choice for all my projects since I focus on web/JavaScript. I have considerable experience setting up databases for my various projects using the MongoDB cloud services, and have used local databases as well. Usually I use Mongoose in my NodeJS back-ends to interface with my databases.
